Reviews.Content: visited dam times precisely expect hotel left pleasantly surprised issues dutch staircase hospitable staircase 5 plus visiting cleanest safe secure value money perfect retreat hustle bustle central station rld smoker friendly tourist friendly pizza restuarant downstairs thanks stay guys soon

Reviews.Title: “great stay - great location”

Reviews.Content: perfect location 2 min central station 2 min city centre breakfast ok served straight stopped front hotel noise road loud day busiest roads night overall stay pleasant
